Class LocalMediaFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • mp3player.desktopaudio.LocalMediaFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements MediaFile, java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      java.io.File getFile()
      Returns a local file in which the media is stored or null if none exists.
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns the name of the file that stores the media.
      long getFileSize()
      Returns the file size in bytes or -1 if not known.
      int hashCode() 
      java.io.InputStream openStream()
      Reads the media as a file, ignoring all format information.
      java.net.URI toURI()
      If the media is stored locally or on an openly accessible server, this method returns the location, otherwise null.
